## Source: ossf-package-analysis (9df89f5f0260f38e93635cc5df99e7ea267d4c07f25e1446a49c08fdf21befe7)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'yc-as-client' @ 11.11.3 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
